captions.text: When others are dressed like this...
you're dressed like this.

BuzzFeed presents: 10
Problems of Always Being Cold
So many layers
Holding those layers
- Do you have a coat check?
- No, we don't actually.
- Oh. Okay...
Warm- blooded people

- Alright guys, are we
keeping this heat on or off?
- Keep it on, keep it on.
- Turn it off please I'm dying back here.
- Yeah it's pretty bad back here.

- Are you serious?
- Sorry babe.
Ice cold handshakes
Intimacy
- I'm sorry are you comfortable with this?

You're like amazingly
bundled up right now.
- I'm very comfortable with my body.

I'm very excited about this.
I'm all about this, I just- -
I'm really cold right now!
Freezing grocery stores
Cold seats
Exiting the shower
And last but not least...
Evil bosses who like it cold

- It is freezing in here,
is it always this cold?
- That's how the boss lady likes it.
- The cold never bothered me anyway.
It's a popular song.
I will not be put on hold!
- Crazy bitch.

comments.text:
I'm anemic. That explains why I'm always cold lol. Drinking a ton of water 
helps worth my temperature and I take iron pills now. When I was skinnier

from medicine, water, layers for days and diet has definitely helped...but 
I'm still cold lol. (Under the covers as I swipe).﻿
